title: Pork Katsu
author: 6229557ac4ed5107ba82258f
prepInstructions: Take pork chop and dip into egg bath, then into panko breadcrumbs. In a cast iron skillet heat oil. Fry pork chops until golden brown and delicious!

title: Boiled Egg
author: 622956ca3d9c5408fe8c2308
prepInstructions: Boil water. Poke a hole in the bottom of the egg. Drop egg into boiling water for 6 minutes and 10 seconds. After time pour out water and allow egg to cool in ice bath for 5 minutes then peel.

title: Quesadilla
author: 622956ca3d9c5408fe8c2307
prepInstructions: Heat a cast iron skillet over medium heat. Add tortilla to warm. After sufficiently warmed add cheese. Once melted top with second tortilla and flip. Warm until second side is slightly crisped and serve.

title: Fruit Salad
author: 622956ca3d9c5408fe8c2309
prepInstructions: Cut fruits and add together in a bowl. Serve with a smile üòÅ

title: 17 Layered Chocolate Cake
author: Anty622956ca3d9c5408fe8c2305Man
prepInstructions: Go to Carne Mare on South Street, in the SeaPort of New York City. Sit at a table. Order steak and fries. Perhaps add on a salad if you're so inclined. For dessert ask your server for the 17 Layered Chocolate Cake. Don't forget to ask for it to go. Once you return home, open togo containter and slide a fork through those 17 layers of chocolatey goodness.
